::Prowl/Unitron/Firestarter/Choran/Imprisoner/Predator::

Prowl growls quietly as Liono talks to IR and walks off. He looks 
after the bot with narrowed eyes untill Liono departs.

-Relax, love, his opinion doesn't matter,- he says telepathically to 
Iron Raptor, feeling the anger from her. He takes a step toward her, 
trying to look and feel reassuring.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Unitron and the group reaches the door. He initiates a mental 
command, detonating the horn missiles to try and blow the door open. 
(I'll wait for Tav to post for the door damage).



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor ignored Liono and his little comments.
> At that moment she couldn't even belive that she had listened to 
him if this 
> was his true self. Some man who got in a hissy fit just because 
something 
> didn't go his way.
> She didn't hate him but she wouldn't let this go. At least Angel 
Prime had 
> appologized. This man was just plain rude.
> < I'll get you back. One way or another.>
> Iron Raptor growled and narroewd her eyes.< Same with the Alliance. 
One way 
> or another.....> Her fist clenched and she clamped her jaw.
> She hated this! Waiting like some dog ready to serve it's master. 
But she 
> had to wait, just a little longer.*
